Allow scroll wheel zoom?: Voleu permetre el zoom amb la roda de desplaçament?
Are you sure you want to cancel your cha: Esteu segur de voler cancel·lar els canvis?
Are you sure you want to clone this map: Esteu segur de voler clonar aquest mapa i totes les capes de dades?
Are you sure you want to delete the feat: Segur que voleu suprimir la característica?
Are you sure you want to delete this map: Esteu segur de voler suprimir aquest mapa?
Center map on your location: Centra el mapa a la vostra ubicació
Choose the format of the data to import: Trieu el format de les dades a importar
Choose the layer of the feature: Choose the layer of the feature
Choose the layer to import in: Trieu la capa que on voleu importar
Define output link to open a new window: Define output link to open a new window on polygon click.
Do you want to display the data layers c: Voleu mostrar el control de les capes de dades?
Double-click to edit: Feu doble clic per a editar
Edit feature's layer: Edita la capa de la característica
How much to simplify the polyline on eac: How much to simplify the polyline on each zoom level (more = better performance and smoother look, less = more accurate)
Map user content has been published unde: El contingut de l'usuari del mapa s'ha publicat sota la llicència
Opcional. El mateix color si no s'estableix.
Gruix del camí en píxels. Des 0 a 10.
Please be sure the licence is compliant: Assegureu-vos que la llicència és compatible amb l'ús que en feu.
Problem in the response: Hi ha un problema en la resposta
Problem in the response format: Hi ha un problema en el format de resposta
Remove icon symbol: Suprimeix el símbol de la icona
Sorry, no location found for {location}: No s'ha trobat ubicació per a {location}
S'han establert l'escala i el centre.
Whether to display or not the Polygon pa: Mostra o no el camí del polígon.
Whether to fill the path with color.
name: nom
template to use for the popup: template to use for the popup
Must be a CSS valid name (eg.: DarkBlue: Ha de ser un nom CSS vàlid (p. ex.: DarkBlue o #123456)
## two hashes for second heading: ## dos coixinets per a capçalera secundària
Comma, tab or semi-colon separated value: Comma, tab or semi-colon separated values. SRS WGS84 is implied. Only Point geometries are imported. The import will look at the column headers for any mention of «lat» and «lon» at the begining of the header, case insensitive. All other column are imported as properties.
Link with text: [[http://example.com|tex: Enllaceu amb el text:  [[http://exemple.com|text de l'enllaç]]
Supported variables that will be dynamic: Supported variables that will be dynamically replaced
You can use feature properties as variab: You can use feature properties as variables: ex.: with "http://myserver.org/images/{name}.png", the {name} variable will be replaced by the "name" value of each markers.
Error in the tilelayer URL: Hi ha un error en l'URL de la cap de tessel·les
Only visible features will be downloaded: Only visible features will be downloaded.
Open this map extent in a map editor to: Open this map extent in a map editor to provide more accurate data to OpenStreetMap
Current view instead of default map view: Voleu la visualització actual en comptes de la visualització predeterminada?
Include full screen link?: Voleu incloure l'enllaç a pantalla completa?
To use if remote server doesn't allow cr: To use if remote server doesn't allow cross domain (slower)
Caption: Llegenda
Do you want to display a caption bar?: Voleu mostrar la barra de llegenda?
Do you want to display a panel on load?: Voleu mostrar el quandre en carregar?
Powered by <a href=\"{leaflet}\">Leaflet: Powered by Leaflet and Django, glued by uMap project.
A string that defines the stroke dash pa: A string that defines the stroke dash pattern. Ex.: «5, 10, 15».
Do you want to display the «more» contro: Do you want to display the «more» control?
Autostart slideshow when map is loaded?: Autostart slideshow when map is loaded?
Property to use for sorting features: Property to use for sorting features
Set a value for adding a slideshow: Set a value for adding a slideshow
Text color for the cluster label: Text color for the cluster label
Are you sure you want to delete this pro: Are you sure you want to delete this property on all the features?
Delete this property on all the features: Suprimeix aquesta propietat a totes les característiques
Edit properties in a table: Edita les propietats en una taula
Please enter the name of the property: Introduïu el nom de la propietat
Rename this property on all the features: Canvia el nom d'aquesta propietat en totes les característiques
If false, the polygon will act as a part: If false, the polygon will act as a part of the underlying map.
Use placeholders with feature properties: Use placeholders with feature properties between brackets, eg. {name}, they will be dynamically replaced by the corresponding values.
You can use formatting and &#123;propert: You can use formatting and {properties} from your features.
Will be displayed in the bottom right co: Will be displayed in the bottom right corner of the map
Will be visible in the caption of the ma: Will be visible in the caption of the map
Woops! Someone else seems to have edited: Woops! Someone else seems to have edited the data. You can save anyway, but this will erase the changes made by others.
Comma separated list of properties to us: Comma separated list of properties to use when filtering features
Click last point to finish shape: Click last point to finish shape
Click to add a marker: Feu clic per a afegir una marca
Click to start drawing a line: Click to start drawing a line
Click to start drawing a polygon: Click to start drawing a polygon
